column4: When im try to install the Ubuntu 9.10 Aplha 4.. The installation stop everytime in 26% and it says ERROR, it can happend when your CD or burn gone wrong... I have test to burn 3-4 CDS and slow but it is the same problem. Someone knows why i got this problem?
ricardoromao: hehe, why? Is the alpha 4 iso file bad?
might be something with be burning speed, ubuntu is very sensitive to high burning speeds
